name: Space Adventures (ShadowGamesStudios)
description:
This game is a simple 3D shooter open world which will take about 20 or more minutes to play Enjoy ! this is my first ever game and it took me about a week i really enjoyed making it i will be creating more games soon !

In this game you play as a human who landed onto another space station and you are on a mission to escape and collect all the cookies.

Hope you will enjoy the game !
